DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the effect of miglitol on daily plasma glucose will be evaluated in type 2 diabetic patients treated with insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Miglitol on Daily Plasma Glucose in type2 Diabetes Treated With Insulin
DOC.criteria: type2 diabetes postprandial plasma glucose levels ≧180mg/dl type1 diabetes AST(GOT) or ALT(GPT) ≧100IU/l creatinine ≧2.0mg/dl
